personalInformation.name: Daniel Umetor
personalInformation.address: 123 Main St, Cape Town, South Africa
personalInformation.bio: A passionate Aspiring software engineer with a love for developing innovative programs that expedite the efficiency and effectiveness of organizational success.

responsibilities: Informing customers about the different types of beds, which are for comfort and for back pain, and also directing them to the main shop.

testimonials.name: Awodwa Hendrick
testimonials.testimonial: Daniel is an incredible friend and a brilliant coder. His passion for programming and quick grasp of complex concepts during our coding bootcamp have been truly inspiring. I'm confident he has a bright future ahead in the tech industry.

testimonials.name: Chelsea Julie
testimonials.testimonial: Daniel's dedication and talent have shone brightly throughout our coding bootcamp. His knack for problem-solving and eagerness to help others have made him an invaluable part of our group. I can't wait to see the amazing things he'll achieve in the tech world!

testimonials.name: Erin Williams
testimonials.testimonial: Daniel has been a standout in our coding bootcamp, consistently impressing us with his sharp intellect and knack for tackling challenging coding tasks.

testimonials.name: Keira Kistensamy
testimonials.testimonial: Daniel's journey through the coding bootcamp has been nothing short of inspiring. His commitment to mastering new skills and solving complex problems sets him apart. As a friend, Daniel is always ready to share insights and support, making our learning experience richer. I have no doubt he'll make a significant impact in the tech world

testimonials.name: Jayden Van Rooyen
testimonials.testimonial: Daniel's dedication to mastering software development is truly impressive. His enthusiasm for learning new languages and frameworks is contagious, and his commitment to excellence sets him apart.

projects.name: Temperature Converter
projects.description: A web application that converts the temperature from Fahrenheit to Degrees Celsius

projects.name: BMI Calculator
projects.description: The Body Mass Index (BMI) Calculator can be used to calculate BMI value and corresponding weight status while taking age into consideration

projects.name: Minutes to Seconds
projects.description: A converter that converts minutes to seconds
